Articles.Content:
Hi,

i just want to edit one part 'One-way' RCS thruster to has a functionality of 'normal fuel' thruster... so i ripped off some lines from liquid engine part and by my consideration add them or replace in the rcs part config... but nothing has happened... can anyone help me with that stuff?

It has still RCS icon, and i think even RCS function... :/

The important ones are:

// --- general parameters ---

name = liquidEngine

module = LiquidEngine

author = Mrbrownce

// --- liquid engine parameters ---

maxThrust = 200

minThrust = 0

heatProduction = 500

fuelConsumption = 8

You probably forgot to change the Module type in the first few lines.
Thx:) it works! but its still 'not' under the engines tab :/

cost = 850

category = 0

subcategory = 0

category changes that (subcategory does nothing, yet)

0 = 1st tab

1 = 2nd tab

etc... (silly programmer counting )

You might find this page quite useful: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/~kerbalsp/wiki/index.php?title=CFG_File_Documentation

Most of the config entries are there, though it hasn\'t been updated in a good while, so some of the newer additions are missing.
May your name be praised! Just what i was looking for, now only thing i need to 'handle' is modeling and texturing Yahoo
